name: A Coin
description:
In this game you try to guide a physics-based coin to the finish line of each level.

Controls:

Left or Right Mouse Button to spawn a coin
AD to steer
Space to jump
Shift to boost
R or Backspace to restart the level
Escape or P to pause

Teamname: One Man Games

Platform: Windows

Content made before the jam:

  • None

Marketplace Assets used:

  • Platformer Starter Pack

Special categories applied for:

  • None
